Html:
Hello,

 

Just trying to build and run UdsoPatternDetector on Windows 7 x64. 

The error is "Error 1 The type or namespace name 'CepPointStreamOperator' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) D:\tools\projects\StreamInsight\StreamInsightProductTeamSamples\Applications\UdsoPatternDetector\UdsoAugmentedFiniteAutomaton\AfaOperator.cs 38 68 UdsoAugmentedFiniteAutomaton".

CepPointStreamOperator should be in Microsoft.ComplexEventProcessing.Extensibility, in assembly Microsoft.ComplexEventProcessing.dll, which is added as a reference to the project.

Any ideas?

Thanks,

Marcel

Marcel,

This sample requires StreamInsight 1.2, where we added the UDSO extensibility interface.

Roman

Hi Roman,

Well, that makes sense. Don't know how I missed that download.

Thank you,

Marcel
